hopobject.name: login
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; en-US; rv:1.9.0.1) Gecko/2008070206 Firefox/3.0.1
hopobject.body:
BeagleBoard.org login page

Before you can edit any pages, you must login.

If the bottom, right-hand corner of the page shows "Logout", then you are currently logged-in.

text with your OpenID identity, then you are logged-in and you were brought to this page due to not having permissions to edit the page you were targeting. If the top, right-hand corner of the page shows a box with the OpenID logo ( ), then you must type your OpenID identity URL into this box and click the "Login" button to proceed.
